1.title: Whidbey Island Dream Home
1.plot: A Texas family searches for a beautiful waterfront home on Washington State's Whidbey Island. Dad wants a secluded retreat with a low-maintenance yard, but mom prefers a turnkey home built right on the water.

2.title: Narragansett Bay Retreat
2.plot: Empty nesters are searching Rhode Island's Narragansett Bay for a beachfront home. Armed with a budget of $1.5 million, this couple is ready to make their lifelong dreams come true and find a place their kids will want to visit.

3.title: Topsail Island House Hunt
3.plot: A couple visits North Carolina's Topsail Island to find an extra-large beach retreat for their family of six. She wants to live close to activities, while he wants a home with plenty of entertaining space and a covered deck.

4.title: Suttons Bay Beach Home
4.plot: A couple hunts for a beachfront family home on Lake Michigan in the small town of Suttons Bay, MI. He wants a move-in ready home with gorgeous views, while she wants a home office and direct access to a kid-friendly beach.

5.title: Big Island Hideaway
5.plot: An active couple is leaving the busy city of Oahu for a retreat on the beaches of the Big Island. He wants a large lanai for hosting parties, while she's looking for a secluded location with direct ocean access.

6.title: Fripp Island Dream Home
6.plot: Empty nesters hunt for an oceanfront home on the shores of Fripp Island, SC. She wants a two-story house with a beautiful view, while he's hoping for a place near the golf course with a decked-out kitchen.

7.title: Hampton Beach House Hunt
7.plot: Engaged engineers draft a plan to find their first home together on the shores of Hampton, VA. She's looking for a well-equipped kitchen, while he wants an office with big windows to brighten his day while working at home.

8.title: Florida Island Beach Retreat
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Oak Island Beach House Hunt
9.plot: A family seeks a legacy beach home on the shores of Oak Island, NC. Dad wants an outdoor space for summer barbecues, mom desires a big kitchen the whole family can cook in and the kids have decreed the house must have a pool.

10.title: Northwest Coast House Hunt
10.plot: A couple is ready to start the next chapter of their lives on the rocky shores of Poulsbo, WA. She wants breathtaking Pacific views and easy water access, while he has his heart set on a turnkey house with a gourmet kitchen.

11.title: Hampton Roads House Hunt
11.plot: A busy couple with two kids wants to find a relaxing beachfront home on the peninsula of Hampton Roads, VA. They hope to find a home with a private dock and updated kitchen, but competition in this beachfront hot spot is fierce.

12.title: Camano Island Beach House
12.plot: A couple from Seattle wants to live closer to the water and is searching for a home on Camano Island, WA. While she's looking for a place with a west-facing view, he wants a fire pit where they can gather for beachside bonfires.

13.title: Palm Coast, Florida House Hunt
13.plot: A family of three wants a forever home in Palm Coast, FL, where they can start vacationing when they step through the door. She's all about the views, while he wants to be in a quiet neighborhood, preferably near a golf course.

14.title: Carolina Beach House Hunt
14.plot: A busy couple hunts for a beach getaway in Carolina Beach, NC, where they can soak up the sun and relax. With a budget of $1.3 million, they hope to find an open-concept home with an ocean-facing deck that's also close to town.

1.title: Beach Home Hunt, Topsail, NC
1.plot: A newlywed couple from Atlanta wants to leave the bustling city and buy their first home on Topsail Island, NC. They want an active beach lifestyle with a family-oriented community, but their long wish list might get in the way.

2.title: Beach Home Hunt in Oregon
2.plot: An Arizona couple fell in love with Brookings, OR, and they want to trade the desert for the beach. They have their heart set on sweeping views and easy beach access, but the rugged coastline may cause problems with those wishes.

3.title: Hunt for an Oregon Beach House
3.plot: A couple with young children is ready to buy a beach home in Gearhart, OR, where they can enjoy all kinds of activities. However, finding a home within their budget on the majestic shores of the Pacific Coast may be difficult.

4.title: Beach Home Hunt in MA
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Beach Home Hunt in Washington
5.plot: A Washington native going through a transition in his life is looking for a fresh start. With the help of his best friend, he chooses the sleepy coastal town of Bellingham, WA, to set down roots and start anew.

6.title: Forever Carolina Beach Home
6.plot: A mother teams up with her daughter to find the perfect home on the southeastern coast of North Carolina. With her modest budget, she'll have to get creative to find a beach property that suits hers.

7.title: Hunt for an Emerald Coast Home
7.plot: A Chicago couple hunts for a beach home for $1.25 million on Florida's Emerald Coast. They hope to find a house with good rental potential and large enough to accommodate all six of their children when they vacation together.

8.title: A Home in Cocoa Beach
8.plot: A family of four is trading the snowy mountains of Denver, Colorado, for the sunny shorelines of Cocoa Beach, FL. They want a move-in ready, waterfront home with room to park their boat for $650,000.

9.title: A Galveston Beach Home Getaway
9.plot: A Texas family adds water and sand to their life and trade in their busy schedules for a beach house on the coastal islands of Galveston, TX.

10.title: Gulf Breeze Dream Home
10.plot: Newlyweds search for a dream home with plenty of entertainment space in the small beach town of Gulf Breeze, FL.

11.title: Florida Gulf Coast Dream Home
11.plot: After years of renting in Perdido Key, FL, a Georgia couple is ready to buy their dream home in this Gulf of Mexico haven. They task their agent with finding a home directly on the water with enough space for their growing family.

12.title: Hunt for Melbourne Beach Home
12.plot: An active couple looks for an open-concept home on the beach in the sleepy surf town of Melbourne Beach, FL.

13.title: New England Coastal Home
13.plot: A Massachusetts couple wants a soft, sandy beach in their backyard so they're moving their family to New England's coastal region in Seabrook, NH.

14.title: Narragansett Beach Home Hunt
14.plot: A couple hunts for a beach home in Narragansett, RI, where they spent time as kids. They want to share those memories with their family, but despite their hefty budget, the exclusive oceanfront neighborhoods limit their options.

15.title: Waterfront Home on Long Island
15.plot: A family with dreams of living in a small town on the water searches for their dream home near Long Island's fabled South Shore.

16.title: Gulf Shores Beach Home Hunt
16.plot: A Louisiana couple searches for the perfect weekend beach getaway on the sands of Gulf Shores, AL.

1.title: Alabama Beach Home Hunt
1.plot: Empty nesters hunt the sugar sand the beaches of Fairhope, AL, for a Gulf Coast retreat. The couple hopes to find the perfect beach home that their boys will want visit for years to come.

2.title: Washington Coast House Hunt
2.plot: A couple leaves landlocked Montana hoping to find a home along the breathtaking beaches of Ferndale, WA. They want a house with panoramic views of the Pacific, outdoor entertaining space and a large bedroom for their teenager.

3.title: Gulf Breeze House Hunt
3.plot: A globetrotting British couple searches the sunny shores of Gulf Breeze, FL, for their dream beach home.

4.title: South Shore House Hunt
4.plot: A Boston-based realtor leaves the hustle and bustle of Beantown behind to find the perfect beach home on Massachusetts's South Shore.

5.title: Navarre House Hunt
5.plot: A family of seven searches the beaches of Navarre, FL, for the perfect seaside home. Mom wants a nice private lot with playroom for the kids, while dad's priorities include a dock and a location near work.

6.title: Camano Island House Hunt
6.plot: A family of four searches for the perfect beach home on Camano Island, Washington. He wants a low-maintenance home with a short commute from Seattle, while she wants a private getaway with breathtaking views of Puget Sound.

7.title: Poulsbo WA House Hunt
7.plot: A widower and his two daughters search Poulsbo, WA, for a forever home on the beach of beautiful Liberty Bay.

8.title: Lake Michigan House Hunt
8.plot: With their four children in college or on the way, a couple is ready to downsize and relocate to a shoreline home in Holland, MI. They hope to find a beach house that will keep their kids coming back for years to come.

9.title: Delaware Bay House Hunt
9.plot: A pair of sisters are in Broadkill Beach, DE, searching for a destination beach home their whole family can enjoy. One wants plenty of space to store their kayaks and beach toys, while the other wants extra bedrooms for guests.

10.title: Emerald Coast House Hunt
10.plot: After saving for years, an Arkansas couple is ready to start a new chapter in Destin, FL, with their four kids. He wants beach views and lots of bedrooms, and she wants a home with a pool where the family can gather for barbecues.

11.title: Florida Keys House Hunt
11.plot: A Midwestern couple is excited to trade cold Minnesota winters for endless summer fun in the Florida Keys. She wants a modern home with a pool, while he's looking for a home with rental potential and plenty of room for their kids.

12.title: Destin, Florida House Hunt
12.plot: A Florida couple that lives inland wants to find a beachfront home where their kids can grow up on Destin's shores. She wants a big yard and four bedrooms, but he's looking for a dock with a boatlift and a mother-in-law suite.

13.title: Kenosha, WI Beach Home Hunt
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: Oahu House Hunt
14.plot: A couple that's ready to start a family is hoping to find their own piece of paradise in super-competitive Oahu, Hawaii. She wants a private property while he's looking for stunning ocean views and a patio for hosting barbecues.

imdb.title: Beach Hunters
plot: Buyers get help searching for their dream homes on the sand in exquisite beach destinations. Along with their agents, they tour properties before choosing homes that fit their budgets and wish lists.
